root.cn:
开始制作疯狂的冰淇凌，现在就开始玩游戏吧！！
从挑选最好的杯子开始！选择水果口味并与冰混合！
搅拌它！是时候装饰它了！添加各种糖果和水果，使您的超级杯蛋糕特别！与您的朋友分享您的杰作！
特征： -从十几个漂亮的杯子中选择 -选择水果口味 -现实生活中的搅拌机 -加糖果配料！ -用贴纸装饰！ -与您的朋友分享！
root.en:
Start making crazy icecream now with this Game !!
Start with Selecting the best Cups! Choose the fruit flavors and mix with Ice!
Blender it! Time to decorate it! Add all sorts of candies and fruits to make your super icecream! Share with your friends your masterpiece!
Features:
- Choose from Dozen of Beautiful Cups
- Choose Fruit Flavor
- Blender like real life
- Add Candie Toppings!
- Decorate with STICKERS!
- Share with your Friends!
